Hardware Error Fatal

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x0
Size:
0x4

Description

Indicates fatal hardware error. Assertion of any bit in this register results in the assertion of the SoC interrupt pin, cptra_error_fatal, unless that bit is masked using the internal mask register. After the output interrupt is asserted, clearing the bit in this register will not cause the interrupt to deassert. Only a Caliptra reset will clear the fatal error interrupt.
Caliptra Access: RW1C
SOC Access: RW1C

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:4] - - - -
[3] crypto_err rw, woclr 0x0 -
[2] nmi_pin rw, woclr 0x0 -
[1] dccm_ecc_unc rw, woclr 0x0 -
[0] iccm_ecc_unc rw, woclr 0x0 -

Field Descriptions

crypto_err

Property Value
resetsignal ^.^.cptra_pwrgood

Property Value
resetsignal ^.^.cptra_pwrgood

Property Value
resetsignal ^.^.cptra_pwrgood

Property Value
